verses.verse: Then sang <WH7891> Deborah <WH1683> and Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> on that day <WH3117>, saying <WH559>,
Praise <WH1288> you the Lord <WH3068> for the avenging <WH6544> of Israel <WH3478>, when the people <WH5971> willingly offered themselves <WH5068>.

Hear <WH8085>, O you kings <WH4428>; give ear <WH238>, O you princes <WH7336>; I <WH7891>, even I, will sing unto the Lord <WH3068>; I will sing <WH2167> praise to the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.

Lord <WH3068>, when you went out <WH3318> of Seir <WH8165>, when you marched out <WH6805> of the field <WH7704> of Edom <WH123>, the earth <WH776> trembled <WH7493>, and the heavens <WH8064> dropped <WH5197>, the clouds <WH5645> also dropped <WH5197> water <WH4325>.
The mountains <WH2022> melted <WH5140> from before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>, even that Sinai <WH5514> from before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.

In the days <WH3117> of Shamgar <WH8044> the son <WH1121> of Anath <WH6067>, in the days <WH3117> of Jael <WH3278>, the highways <WH734> were unoccupied <WH2308>, and the travelers <WH1980> walked <WH3212> through byways <WH6128>.

The inhabitants of the villages <WH6520> ceased <WH2308>, they ceased <WH2308> in Israel <WH3478>, until that I Deborah <WH1683> arose <WH6965>, that I arose <WH6965> a mother <WH517> in Israel <WH3478>.

They chose <WH977> new <WH2319> gods <WH430>; then was war <WH3901> in the gates <WH8179>: was there a shield <WH4043> or spear <WH7420> seen <WH7200> among forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> in Israel <WH3478>?
My heart <WH3820> is toward the governors <WH2710> of Israel <WH3478>, that offered themselves willingly <WH5068> among the people <WH5971>. Bless <WH1288> you the Lord <WH3068>.
Speak <WH7878>, you that ride <WH7392> on white <WH6715> donkeys <WH860>, you that sit <WH3427> in judgment <WH4055>, and walk <WH1980> by the way <WH1870>.

They that are delivered from the noise <WH6963> of archers <WH2686> in the places of drawing water <WH4857>, there shall they rehearse <WH8567> the righteous acts <WH6666> of the Lord <WH3068>, even the righteous acts <WH6666> toward the inhabitants of his villages <WH6520> in Israel <WH3478>: then shall the people <WH5971> of the Lord <WH3068> go down <WH3381> to the gates <WH8179>.

Awake <WH5782>, awake <WH5782>, Deborah <WH1683>: awake <WH5782>, awake <WH5782>, utter <WH1696> a song <WH7892>: arise <WH6965>, Barak <WH1301>, and lead your captivity <WH7628> captive <WH7617>, you son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42>.
Then he made him that remains <WH8300> have dominion <WH7287> over the nobles <WH117> among the people <WH5971>: the Lord <WH3068> made me have dominion <WH7287> over the mighty <WH1368>.

Out of Ephraim <WH669> was there a root <WH8328> of them against Amalek <WH6002>; after <WH310> you <WH1144>, Benjamin, among your people <WH5971>; out of Machir <WH4353> came down <WH3381> governors <WH2710>, and out of Zebulun <WH2074> they that handle <WH4900> the pen <WH7626> of the writer <WH5608>.

And the princes <WH8269> of Issachar <WH3485> were with Deborah <WH1683>; even Issachar <WH3485>, and also Barak <WH1301>: he was sent <WH7971> on foot <WH7272> into the valley <WH6010>. For the divisions <WH6390> of Reuben <WH7205> there were great <WH1419> thoughts <WH2711> of heart <WH3820>.

Why lived <WH3427> you among <WH996> the sheepfolds <WH4942>, to hear <WH8085> the bleatings <WH8292> of the flocks <WH5739>? For the divisions <WH6390> of Reuben <WH7205> there were great <WH1419> searchings <WH2714> of heart <WH3820>.

Gilead <WH1568> lived <WH7931> beyond <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>: and why did Dan <WH1835> remain <WH1481> in ships <WH591>? Asher <WH836> continued <WH3427> on the sea <WH3220> shore <WH2348>, and lived <WH7931> in his breaches <WH4664>.
Zebulun <WH2074> and Naphtali <WH5321> were a people <WH5971> that jeoparded <WH2778> their lives <WH5315> unto the death <WH4191> in the high places <WH4791> of the field <WH7704>.

The kings <WH4428> came <WH935> and fought <WH3898>, then fought <WH3898> the kings <WH4428> of Canaan <WH3667> in Taanach <WH8590> by the waters <WH4325> of Megiddo <WH4023>; they took <WH3947> no gain <WH1215> of money <WH3701>.
They fought <WH3898> from heaven <WH8064>; the stars <WH3556> in their courses <WH4546> fought <WH3898> against Sisera <WH5516>.

The river <WH5158> of Kishon <WH7028> swept them away <WH1640>, that ancient <WH6917> river <WH5158>, the river <WH5158> Kishon <WH7028>. O my soul <WH5315>, you have trodden down <WH1869> strength <WH5797>.
Then were the horsehoofs <WH6119> broken <WH1986> by the means of the prancings <WH1726>, the prancings <WH1726> of their mighty ones <WH47>.

Curse <WH779> you Meroz <WH4789>, said <WH559> the angel <WH4397> of the Lord <WH3068>, curse <WH779> you bitterly <WH779> the inhabitants <WH3427> there <WH935>; because they came not to the help <WH5833> of the Lord <WH3068>, to the help <WH5833> of the Lord <WH3068> against the mighty <WH1368>.
Blessed <WH1288> above women <WH802> shall Jael <WH3278> the wife <WH802> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite <WH7017> be <WH1288>, blessed shall she be above women <WH802> in the tent <WH168>.
He asked <WH7592> water <WH4325>, and she gave <WH5414> him milk <WH2461>; she brought forth <WH7126> butter <WH2529> in a lordly <WH117> dish <WH5602>.

She put <WH7971> her hand <WH3027> to the nail <WH3489>, and her right hand <WH3225> to the workmen <WH6001>'s hammer <WH1989>; and with the hammer she struck <WH1986> Sisera <WH5516>, she struck off <WH4277> his head <WH7218>, when she had pierced <WH4272> and struck through <WH2498> his temples <WH7541>.

At her feet <WH7272> he bowed <WH3766>, he fell <WH5307>, he lay down <WH7901>: at her feet <WH7272> he bowed <WH3766>, he fell <WH5307>: where <WH834> he bowed <WH3766>, there he fell down <WH5307> dead <WH7703>.

The mother <WH517> of Sisera <WH5516> looked <WH8259> out at a window <WH2474>, and cried <WH2980> through the lattice <WH822>, Why is his chariot <WH7393> so long <WH954> in coming <WH935>? Why wait <WH309> the wheels <WH6471> of his chariots <WH4818>?
Her wise <WH2450> ladies <WH8282> answered <WH6030> her <WH7725>, Yes, she returned answer to herself <WH561>,

Have they not found <WH4672>? have they not divided <WH2505> the prey <WH7998>; to every <WH7218> man <WH1397> a girl <WH7356> or two <WH7361>; to Sisera <WH5516> a prey <WH7998> of various colors <WH6648>, a prey <WH7998> of various colors <WH6648> of needlework <WH7553>, of various colors <WH6648> of needlework on both sides <WH7553>, meet for the necks <WH6677> of them that take the plunder <WH7998>?

So let all your enemies <WH341> perish <WH6>, O Lord <WH3068>: but let them that love <WH157> him be as the sun <WH8121> when he goes forth <WH3318> in his might <WH1369>. And the land <WH776> had rest <WH8252> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>.
